wikipedia_page.main: Penny Streeter OBE (born 1 August 1967) is an English entrepreneur and founder of the A24 Group, comprising Ambition 24hours, Arabella Health Staffing and the NS Health Staffing. Penny Streeter established the medical staffing group in Sutton, England, in 1996, working with her mother Marion.

link_mentions.page: Penny Streeter, Order of the British Empire

response: * Penny Streeter OBE, managing director of a UK recruitment agency

The house and gardens were acquired in July 2017 by the Benguela Collection Hospitality Group, owned by the South African-based entrepreneur Penny Streeter, which is providing restoration and maintenance. It reopened to the public in April 2019.Leonardslee Gardens The Benguela Collection Hospitality Group is also the owner of Mannings Heath Golf Club & Wine Estate in Horsham,  away.Benguela Collection, Retrieved 20 May 2019
The estate was acquired by Penny Streeter OBE in 2016 and is a division of The Benguela Collection, a wine producer and hospitality group in the United Kingdom and South Africa.

He joined healthcare recruitment company Ambition Recruitment Services as Sales Director in 1999, working with Penny Streeter. During his six years at the company, Stiff was instrumental in increasing his sales team's turnover from £3m to £75m per annum.
